short_summary: Requirement for a contractor to work on the development and modification of LIMS-Plus Crystal Reports, MS SQL queries, and Cognos BI reports, as well as development and modification of existing VB.Net applications, and recommendations and training in the use of Team Foundation Server product.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires a contractor to work on the development and modification of LIMS-Plus Crystal Reports, MS SQL queries, and Cognos BI reports; development and modification of existing VB.Net applications; recommendations and training in the use of the Team Foundation Server product. The contractor may be expected to conduct peer reviews which are directed at the IT quality of an internal product. The contractor will work on data mining, reporting and development activities.
duration_in_months: But one additional year can be extended on a as is term, with two extensions possible thereafter of up to one year, extending the overall potential duration to over three additional years or up to 48 months, in total for 51 months.
